author: Daniel Greene
description:
A huge wave of fantasy news this week! We’ve got our first look at the new Harry Potter HBO series, confirmation that ACOTAR Book 6 is done, and YouTube is finally preparing to crack down on AI-generated content spam. Plus, new covers, reveals, and updates from Malazan, Empire of Silence, Ilona Andrews, Dungeon Crawler Carl, Murderbot, Borderlands 4, and more. Let’s get into it.

🧙‍♂️ Timestamps & Sources
00:00 New Harry Potter First Look: https://variety.com/2025/tv/global/harry-potter-hbo-series-starts-filming-first-look-1236453094/
01:34 WoT Project Update: https://www.patreon.com/DanielBGreene
03:09 Dungeon Crawler Carl Webtoon Release
05:17 Operation Bounce House: https://people.com/see-the-cover-of-operation-bounce-house-and-read-an-excerpt-exclusive-11771495
06:36 New Ilona Andrews: https://reactormag.com/cover-reveal-this-kingdom-will-not-kill-me-by-ilona-andrews/
07:55 New Malazan Art: https://bsky.app/profile/thebrokenbinding.bsky.social/post/3ltmf55ujss2v
08:07 On Sunday’s
title: NEW Harry Potter First Look, ACOTAR 6 Complete! Lost Footage FOUND! | Fantasy News
